TopicTitle: presenting the new Ixolate Industires Minmus-1 lander

Articles.Content:
Presenting my first completely stock lander

This small but capable vehicle is able to land on any low gravity moons

For my first test I sent it to Kerbin's moon Minmus

Upon landing I realized that due to a lack of planning the amount of fuel used in the transfer stage was far more than required so for the next mission I endeavoured to use the whole tank

sending the ship to Duna's moon Ike

unfortunately I had mislaid the flood lights and so when Jeb tried to land on the night time side of the moon he was un able to see the ground

but look at his happy face

hope you enjoy as much as I did

Now includes flood lights (batteries not included)

http://www./download/o2bg2flfxm4fdc2/Minmus_lander.craft
Who needs legs on a lander! Pretty cool though. Like the way the engines are positioned.
I used to position my engines like that, but then I realized that it's kinda inefficient.
I know its a bit inefficient but it does function fairly well now it has lights
